Product description

Faber gives your family ultra purified drinking water with 7 stages RO+UF+MAT with mineral enchance technology, ro membrane work upto 2500 TDS filtration limit, the galaxy range of water purifier is built with capability to water purifier from any source. This purifier comes with a storage capacity 9 liters and can be conveniently mounted any wall of your kitchen. Best suited for Indian homes and offices and suitable for municipality corporation water supply/tap water/ground water. Abs food grade plastic, mounting dimensions(mm): 460 (h) x 210 (w) x 360 (l)weight:7.5 kg storage capacity: 9 litre water filtration: 8 stage filter cartridges: sediment 1(20 micron), carbon filter, sediment 2(5micron), RO membrane (2500 tdsxppm), post carbon filter, mat filter and uf.
